text: There was no chemistry between the two people who were supposed to have been together for three years. And the fiance was completely miscast. Honestly Gabe, the angel won my vote to win the girl. Should have been written with a different plot and outcome. Actors can overcome a weak script, but these actors did not overcome. I think if the fiancé had been cast with an appealing guy, the movie could have been redeemed.

This is genuinely the worst Christmas film I've ever watched, and I've watched a lot. I couldn't even finish it, it's slow, lacks a story, and I cannot continue.

If you've watched it, the ice skating scene at the start of the film is the WORST!!!

I liked it.  I thought that Chad Micheal Murray's acting was appropriate.  He is playing an angel.  I would imagine that an angel would be a little out of place in our world, so I thought the direction he took on the part was spot on.  I saw the same lead actors in another film recently and so the acting in this film was more noticeable.
I like Chad Michael Murray, but he seemed to be talking like a robot in this movie! Also, I didn't find that any of the characters had chemistry. It's a weird one – not the best of the year.
